title: Microsoft | L60 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech Tier II
Years of Experience: 1.5
Prior Experience: Not FAANG (Top Investment Banking firm)
Current Base: 21L
Bonus (Fixed): 4L

Date of the Offer: Jan 2025
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L60
Location: Bangalore
Base: 22.5L
Relocation: None (same city)
Signing Bonus: None
Stock bonus: $35K vested over 4 years
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 20% of salary every year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 34L 
Benefits: Standard MS benefits

Since I am joining in March, I would be eligible for the September appraisal. Total hike on my current TC is coming out to be 30-35%.

I tried to negotiate but the recruiter was rude and gave a take it or leave it offer, my current company is not interested to give a counter offer.
I know this is lowball, they did not agree to give any signing bonus and are giving fresher level stocks. I have accepted the offer as I did not have any choice at the moment, can anyone rate this offer and please give me any advice if it is possible to negotiate further.
